docs.snippet: The 101st Precinct in Far Rockaway, a low-income neighborhood wary of the police, has seen halting progress as the department seeks to reshape everyday interactions between officers and residents....
docs.lead_paragraph: The 101st Precinct in Far Rockaway, a low-income neighborhood wary of the police, has seen halting progress as the department seeks to reshape everyday interactions between officers and residents.
docs.abstract: Far Rockaway's 101st Precinct tests model of community policing that gives officers opportunity to interact with members of neighborhood throughout their shift and not just respond to crime; city plans to expand pilot program, which has national endorsement, to more than dozen other areas, in hopes of solving potential problems and reducing crime.

headline.main: In New York, Testing Grounds for Community Policing
headline.print_headline: Back on the Beat in Far Rockaway

docs.snippet: With Venezuela sinking in an economic crisis, raising the prospects of opposition candidates, the government has taken measures to rule several of them ineligible....
docs.lead_paragraph: With Venezuela sinking in an economic crisis, raising the prospects of opposition candidates, the government has taken measures to rule several of them ineligible.
docs.abstract: Enzo Scarano, Venezuelan politician prohibited from running for office because he filed financial disclosure late, is one of nine opposition candidates in Venezuela that have been barred from ballot for National Assembly election due to bureaucratic technicalities; Venezuela's government, which has been struggling with economic crisis, appears to be using this and other measures to weaken its opposition in coming election in effort to maintain legislative majority.

headline.main: 9 Opposition Candidates Barred From Venezuela’s December Ballot
headline.print_headline: 9 Opposition Candidates Barred From Venezuela’s December Ballot

byline.contributor: Patricia Torres contributed reporting from Caracas, Venezuela.
